snippet: The Ministry of Information dialed back an earlier assertion that Syria-based militants would soon release 45 Fijian members of a United Nations peacekeeping force.
lead_paragraph: The Ministry of Information dialed back an earlier assertion that Syria-based militants would soon release 45 Fijian members of a United Nations peacekeeping force.

headline.main: Fiji, in Clarification, Says Peacekeepers Remain Held in Golan Heights
